member.name: T:BloonsTD6_Mod_Helper.BloonsTD6Mod
member.summary: Extend this Class instead of MelonMod to gain access to dozens of easy to use built-in hooks

member.name: M:BloonsTD6_Mod_Helper.BloonsTD6Mod.OnMainMenu
member.summary:
Called when you go to the main menu screen
Equivalent to a HarmonyPostFix on MainMenu.OnEnable

member.summary:
Called on the frame that a key starts being held

Called on the frame that a key stops being held

member.name: M:BloonsTD6_Mod_Helper.BloonsTD6Mod.OnKeyHeld(UnityEngine.KeyCode)
member.summary:
Called every frame that a key is being held
Equivalent to a HarmonyPostFix on Input.GetKey

member.name: M:BloonsTD6_Mod_Helper.BloonsTD6Mod.PreBloonLeaked(Assets.Scripts.Simulation.Bloons.Bloon)
member.summary:
Called right before a Bloon would leak. Return 'false' to prevent the leak from happening
Equivalent to a HarmonyPreFix on Bloon.Leaked

Called right after a Bloon leaks. Return 'false' to prevent the leak from happening
Equivalent to a HarmonyPostFix on Bloon.Leaked
